channel.title: FLIR aircraft games?
channel.description:
Does anyone know of any FLIR games?
'Forward looking infrared (FLIR) is an imaging technology that senses infrared radiation'
I have this obsession with FLIR and I'm looking for games that involve it. So far I've found:
- Cod 4 (It was only one level and they didn't even take it to mw2) - Jetfighter V (Don't know if it's considered FLIR but it was a LANTIRN system) - Arma 2 (Downloading atm. Not sure if it's only available in mods but I know it's there) - VBS2 (Downloading atm, gonna fly UAV drones :D): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I0OuB1yge-E
Looking for suggestions on any other games.
Edit: Something like this:
[img]http://www.expose-the-war-profiteers.org/DOD/iraq_II_videos/apache_files/apache_1.jpg[/img]
